Package neuron_based.neurons

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BiasNeuron
    This is an extension of Neuron used to represent bias in a NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork.
    InnerNeuron
    This is an extension of Neuron.
    InputNeuron
    This is an extension of Neuron, used to represent the Neurons in the first Layer (InputLayer) in a NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork.
    Neuron
    This is a simple abstract class describing a Neuron in a NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork, and has several subclasses with different Neurons.
    OutputNeuron
    This is an extension of Neuron, used to represent the Neurons in the last Layer (OutputLayer) of a NeuronBasedNeuralNetwork.
